modules.description: Translates cmdlang parser definitions into equivalent cmdliner command specifications. It processes parser metadata to generate command-line interface elements like flags, arguments, and documentation. Uses the `manpage_of_readme` function to construct manual page sections from README content for command help output.

Translates documentation strings for command-line parameters by incorporating the parameter's name and type information into the provided base documentation. Works directly with `Cmdlang_ast.Ast.Param.t` values, which represent parsed command-line parameters in the cmdlang AST. Useful for generating descriptive help messages when converting cmdlang-based command definitions to Cmdliner-compatible interfaces.

This module translates cmdlang parser components into cmdliner command-line interface elements. It includes submodules for converting parameter documentation into cmdliner-compatible formats and generating command specifications with flags, arguments, and help text derived from cmdlang AST structures. It directly operates on `Cmdlang_ast.Ast.Param.t` values and parser metadata to produce Cmdliner command definitions with integrated README-based manual pages.

Translates cmdlang command definitions into executable cmdliner commands, converting parameters, arguments, and command metadata into their cmdliner equivalents. Works directly with `Cmdlang.Command.Param.t`, `Cmdlang.Command.Arg.t`, and `Cmdlang.Command.t` to produce `Cmdliner.Arg.conv`, `Cmdliner.Term.t`, and `Cmdliner.Cmd.t` values. Used to build command-line interfaces with typed arguments, automatic help generation, and versioned commands based on parsed cmdlang specifications.

Translates command definitions into executable command-line interfaces with typed arguments and automatic help. Converts parameters, arguments, and command metadata into cmdliner equivalents. Used to build versioned commands and structured CLIs from parsed specifications.
